page.title: 09CLUBS
page.content: There are many clubs that meet in our area for children .Many of them are connected with the churches.St. Johns has Beavers for boys up to eight years old.At eight they move up to the 14th Farnworth St.John's Cubs.Girls from seven to eleven can join the 3rd Farnworth St John's Brownies.At eleven boys and girls can join the Scouts or Guides. There are Sunday School meetings at St. John's,St. Gregory's and Holland's School.Some children from the area attend the Children's Challenge at the Baptist Church near the Library. A dog training group,darts team and a keep fit group meet at The Rawsons Arms Hotel.A badminton club,Farnworth Amateur Operatic and Dramatic Society use St.John' s school hall. Charities and Trade Unions use Holland' School Hall.
